preqs: MKF9120 or MKF5912 or be enrolled in course 4431.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {4431, B6010} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKF5912, MKF9120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true

time: First semester 2017 (On-campus split block of classes)

description: An in-depth introduction to the critical thinking and planning required in the initial stages of a thesis or research project. Development of a literature review, research model and research proposal.
